AppSettings.ContentSecurity: worker-src 'none'; form-action 'self' *.azurewebsites.net *.uniodigital.com.br *.unimedvitoria.com.br; base-uri 'self' *.azurewebsites.net *.uniodigital.com.br  *.unimedvitoria.com.br;  default-src 'self' *.visualstudio.com blob:; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval'; object-src 'self' blob:; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; img-src 'self' localhost:* data: 'self'; media-src 'self' data: 'self'; frame-src 'self' data: 'self'; font-src 'self' localhost:*; upgrade-insecure-requests; connect-src 'self' localhost:* blob:;
